content.json:
A workbook to show data of Sentinel Health. Please use this link to enable Sentinel Health Logs
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/monitor-data-connector-health

content.query:
//Query Name : by Resource Name
SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| summarize count() by SentinelResourceName
content.title: Sentinel Health by Resource Name

content.query:
SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| where OperationName == 'Data fetch status change'
| where Status in ('Success', 'Failure')
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId
| where Status == 'Failure'
content.title: Detect latest failure events per connector

content.query:
let lastestStatus = SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| where OperationName == 'Data fetch status change'
| where Status in ('Success', 'Failure')
| project TimeGenerated, SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, LastStatus = Status
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId;
let nextToLastestStatus = SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| where OperationName == 'Data fetch status change'
| where Status in ('Success', 'Failure')
| join kind = leftanti (lastestStatus) on SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, NextToLastStatus = Status
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId;
lastestStatus
| join kind=inner (nextToLastestStatus) on SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId
| where NextToLastStatus == 'Failure' and LastStatus == 'Success'
content.title: Detect connectors with changes from fail to success state

content.query:
let lastestStatus = SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| where OperationName == 'Data fetch status change'
| where Status in ('Success', 'Failure')
| project TimeGenerated, SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, LastStatus = Status
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId;
let nextToLastestStatus = SentinelHealth
| where SentinelResourceType in ({Resources})
| where OperationName == 'Data fetch status change'
| where Status in ('Success', 'Failure')
| join kind = leftanti (lastestStatus) on SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId, NextToLastStatus = Status
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId;
lastestStatus
| join kind=inner (nextToLastestStatus) on SentinelResourceName, SentinelResourceId
| where NextToLastStatus == 'Success' and LastStatus == 'Failure'
content.title: Detect connectors with changes from success to fail state
Sentinel Health by Operation Name
Sentinel Health by by SentinelResourceKind
Sentinel Health Status Count
Sentinel Health by Description

content.query:
SentinelHealth
| summarize makelist(TimeGenerated) by SentinelResourceType, SentinelResourceKind,SentinelResourceName
content.title: Sentinel Health Summary
